class.name: Lua
class.description: Execute Lua code as runtime and make your own API.

method.name: call_function
method.description: Calls a function inside current Lua state. This can be either a exposed function or a function defined with with lua. You may want to check if the function actually exists with [code]lua_function_exists(LuaFunctionName)[/code]. This function supports 1 return value from lua. It will be returned as a variant and if lua returns no value it will be null.

method.name: load_file
method.description: Loads a file with luaL_laodfile() passing its absolute path.

method.name: lua_function_exists
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] only if [code]LuaFunctionName[/code] is defined in current Lua's state as a function.

method.name: push_variant
method.description: Will push a copy of a Variant to lua as a global.

method.name: pull_variant
method.description: Will pull a copy of a glboal Variant from lua to GDScript.
